text: Yeah, I'll have a think about it over the weekend. Not really sure the air field thing was a winner anyway. Are you still thinking about doing something similar to the amtrack snow plow effect? I do think that is a winner. The techniques you develop there will be applicable to all kinds of stuff in the future. You could easily switch the snow to dirt to do like a crashing spaceship thing. There is a lot of learning to be done on a shot like that.
